info.+content: Gabimaru the Hollow is one of the most vicious assassins ever to come out of the ninja village of Iwagakure. He’s ruthlessly efficient, but a betrayal results in him being handed a death sentence. He has only one hope—in order to earn his freedom, he must travel to a long-hidden island and recover an elixir that will make the shogun immortal. Failure is not an option. On this island, heaven and hell are just a hair’s breadth away. (from manga)

title.+content: The Death Row Convict and the Executioner

release.+content: Hell's Paradise - Season 1 [Amazon Exclusive Limited Edition] (BD+DVD)
